Paper.Title: THE PARSODY SYSTEM : AUTOMATIC PREDICTION OF PROSODIC BOUNDARIES FOR TEXT-TO-SPEECH

Section.SectionTitle: THE PARSODY SYSTEM : AUTOMATIC PREDICTION OF PROSODIC BOUNDARIES FOR TEXT-TO-SPEECH
Section.Paragraph: tel +44-473-645384, e-mail : sminnis@bt-sys.bt.co.uk@unet As commercial text-to-speech systems move above the word level to the sentence level, the prediction of the correct prosodic information becomes a significant factor in the perceived naturalness of the synthesised speech.

This article reports on "Parsody", an experimental system which combines a partial parser with a prosodic marking component to predict the location and relative strength of prosodic boundaries in text.
